text:
Ippolito "Ito" Giani (8 September 1941 – 28 September 2018) was an Italian sprinter. He was born in Varese, Italy. From 1963 to 1967 he took part in 20 international competitions. He was in the 1964 Summer Olympics, and won six medals.
Giani died in Varese on 28 September 2018 at the age of 77.
